MouseBlock.Try: Sometimes you need to collapse a piece of code for better readability. Try collapsing code with CollapseRegion.
To expand a code region, press ExpandRegion.
If you want to collapse all regions in the file, use CollapseAllRegions.
Similarly, press ExpandAllRegions to expand all available regions.
In , there's a way to fold any sequence of statements or declarations. Try folding the selected region with CollapseSelection.
Now press ExpandRegion to go the other way.
And finally, use CollapseBlock to fold the control flow statements.
